user_query: I want to organize a company event in Spain. Can you provide me with the single VAT rate for Spain? Additionally, give me the past 1 day price data of The Sandbox - SAND cryptocurrency. Moreover, I need the latest FX rates for major currencies.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the current VAT rate for Spain.
Fetch the past 1 day price data for The Sandbox (SAND) cryptocurrency.
Get the latest foreign exchange rates for major currencies.
